channel.title: Financial Health on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Health on FinanClub

item.title: MPW
item.description: score:103 Chances: The $886 million asset sale will provide a significant boost to the company’s liquidity and help in paying down debt. The company’s stock and bond prices have seen a positive impact from the recent asset sale. The sale of five facilities in California and New Jersey for $350 million will also contribute to improving the company’s financial position.
